alert.note: Alert for Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 9:21PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Isle of Wight, and southeastern York Counties, the City of Poquoson, the City of Norfolk, the City of Chesapeake, the City of Portsmouth, the City of Suffolk, the City of Hampton and the City of Newport News through 1000 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fort Eustis to near Smithfield to near Corapeake. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Smithfield, Langley AFB, Ocean View, Hampton University, Old Dominion University, Christopher Newport University, Downtown Norfolk, Patrick Henry Field, Great Bridge, Downtown Suffolk, Deep Creek, Downtown Portsmouth, Churchland, Norfolk State University, Seaford, Norfolk, Chesapeake and Portsmouth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chesapeake; Hampton, Poquoson; Isle of Wight; Newport News; Norfolk, Portsmouth; Suffolk; York
